concealed.name: Concealed
concealed.description: At the push of a button, the force-shield disappears, leaving only the projection bracer.

guidance.name: Guidance
guidance.description: Wielder can spend 1 action and one life to commune with the demon accelerator. The accelerated flail then gains [+] to strike one target.

vorpal-edge.name: Vorpal Edge
vorpal-edge.description: Can be used as an improvised melee weapon to deal 1d4 damage. On critical hits, it severs extremities.
